item.title: How to use Bootstrap 5 in React.js - an original tutorial with (not original) examples
item.description: Bootstrap is a holy Grail for most of us - it’s the most popular HTML, CSS and most of all JS library in the world. And as a Christmas miracleâ€”Bootstrap v5.3.0-alpha1 has arrived during the holiday break, so… let’s dig inside and check how to use bootstrap in React.
